Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: marinara \marinara\ n. An Italian sauce containing tomatoes, garlic, herbs, and spices. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: marinara \marinara\ a. Served in marinara sauce; -- used postpositionally, as veal marinara. [PJC]
marinara n : sauce for pasta; contains tomatoes and garlic and herbs
